individual_metadata.synopsis: Gale has been evicted from the party, then killed.
individual_metadata.how_to_trigger: Evict Gale from the party.Then kill him.

35.speaker: Narrator
35.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

31.speaker: Shadowheart
31.context: NodeContext: SH is dead/being spoken to via magic. Short, cryptic phrases.

24.speaker: Shadowheart
24.context: NodeContext: SH is dead/being spoken to via magic. Short, cryptic phrases.

29.speaker: Shadowheart
29.context: NodeContext: SH is dead/being spoken to via magic. Short, cryptic phrases.

3.speaker: Shadowheart
3.context: NodeContext: SH is dead/being spoken to via magic. Short, cryptic phrases.

25.speaker: Player
25.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player turns hostile to unrecruited SH during the Voice of Absolute scene then flees while she's alive and camps, the box will appear at camp and SH will die off-screen. This option implies that the box itself killed her.

10.speaker: Shadowheart
10.text: The artefact... I felt it burn...
10.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

36.speaker: Player
36.text: The artefact burned? What do you mean?
36.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player turns hostile to unrecruited SH during the Voice of Absolute scene then flees while she's alive and camps, the box will appear at camp and SH will die off-screen. This option implies that the box itself killed her.

32.speaker: Shadowheart
32.text: I felt it. It didn't want to stay with me... I failed...
32.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

33.speaker: Shadowheart
33.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

39.speaker: Shadowheart
39.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

9.speaker: Player
9.text: A cleric? Who do you worship?

16.speaker: Player
16.text: What is the artefact you had?

41.speaker: Shadowheart
41.text: A secret. My mission. Must keep it safe...
41.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

6.speaker: Shadowheart
6.text: Protect the artefact. Deliver to Baldur's Gate...
6.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

1.speaker: Player
1.text: How do I get rid of the artefact?

15.speaker: Shadowheart
15.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

28.speaker: Shadowheart
28.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Where do you keep your valuables?

43.speaker: Shadowheart
43.context: NodeContext: SH is dead, but partially reanimated to answer questions. Fragmented, no awareness of surrounds or deceased status

40.speaker: Narrator
40.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

19.speaker: Wyll
19.text: Wyll Ravengard... the Blade of Frontiers...

5.speaker: Player
5.text: What does that mean, 'The Blade of Frontiers'?

3.speaker: Wyll
3.text: Fight monsters... protect the Sword Coast...

17.speaker: Player
17.text: Ravengard? Are you related to Duke Ulder Ravengard?

25.speaker: Narrator
25.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

27.speaker: Narrator
27.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

31.speaker: Astarion
31.text: Taken by mind flayers... killed after crash...

5.speaker: Astarion
5.text: Met people... Talked. Flirted. Lured back for my master...

26.speaker: Player
26.text: Have many people have you killed?

13.speaker: Astarion
13.text: Some... but never to feed... only brought master living victims...

10.speaker: Astarion
10.text: Two hundred years?... hard to remember...

3.speaker: Player
3.text: What were you planning to do as a Vampire Lord?

16.speaker: Astarion
16.text: Rule this place... finally be free...

35.speaker: Player
35.text: How did you end up in the ritual?

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: Brought to Gur hunter camp... Cazador found them... took me...

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Dead... abandoned... Cazador found me... brought me back...

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Cazador's dead. I just wanted you to know.

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: Crèche K'liir... among the Tears of Selûne...

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Cleanse the parasite... end the Grand Design...

7.speaker: Lae'zel
7.text: Return Prism to Vlaakith... be cured, ascend...

21.speaker: Lae'zel
21.text: Use the zaith'isk... remove the parasite...

16.speaker: Lae'zel
16.text: Find a crèche... cleanse the parasite...

22.speaker: Lae'zel
22.text: Fighter... Blade of the Undying Queen...

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: Ascension... knighthood... silver sword, ride dragon...

6.speaker: Player
6.text: What were you most afraid of?

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: To be illithid... to be forgotten...

28.speaker: Narrator
28.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

16.speaker: Jaheira
16.context: InternalNodeContext: Specific to DU ending of accept Bhaal - Handwaving it with Bhaal chosen to cover edge case of them leaving the party dead after the Orin fight and never confronting the player

9.speaker: Jaheira
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Hoping this covers her dying either in Haven, Moonrise, vs Doppels or against Minsc

10.speaker: Jaheira
10.context: InternalNodeContext: Never recruited/released before Minsc flow

7.speaker: Player
7.text: What should I tell your family?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I saw you with Minsc in the Counting House - what happened?

30.speaker: Jaheira
30.context: NodeContext: Usual Speak with Dead breathiness, but short, sudden burst of amusement

6.speaker: Player
6.text: How do I save the city?
6.context: InternalNodeContext: I was really stuck for what you should be able to ask Jaheira for an answer to that she couldn't help with or have an opinion on...

5.speaker: Narrator
5.text: *The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

24.speaker: Narrator
24.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

20.speaker: Narrator
20.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

31.speaker: Gale
31.text: Elminster came... offered solution... turned... Orin... taken...

28.speaker: Gale
28.text: Bring me back... cast the spell... utmost... importance...

34.speaker: Player
34.text: Why are you so insistent I resurrect you?

35.speaker: Gale
35.text: Bring me back... before... too late... must cast the spell...

27.speaker: Gale
27.text: Not concentrating... my magic... not focused...

21.speaker: Gale
21.text: Without knowing... without feeling... choking on darkness...

1.speaker: Player
1.text: What were you trying to achieve?

26.speaker: Gale
26.text: Ending... the Absolute... with a bang...

16.speaker: Gale
16.text: Seeking... another way... to fight... to win...

4.speaker: Gale
4.text: Wizard... archmage... wielder of the Weave...

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Do you have any last words for me?

9.speaker: Gale
9.text: When your sky dims... I will be there... waiting...

5.speaker: Player
5.text: What becomes of a wizard after death?

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*
